post.body: No I was not. You? Was it fun?
they were really great!
I'd like to. Maybe we could connect?
Stand tall and let the man know how much we miss him.
Thanks brother. Could use a wingman . . .
Yeah. It's not just red, it's RED! Thanks for the response.
Oh I don't know. Friends wanted to go out somewhere nice and Tanya got all dressed up so I thought . . . why not?
I believe it is some sort of ritual. I've seen it practiced in various parts of the world.
Whoops. Sorry. That totally sucks.
Egypt.
Ah. Thanks. It's not all that bad. Doing a lot of cleanup physically and digitally. Enjoy the day & see you next week.
At the office but not sure the term "working" is very accurate.
At Berryhill for dinner with some of my BFF's.
Sally Tibbs vocals with the piano is sublime.
Buddy Steve Welsh in the house.
7 of us at a tiny table in the bar. Crowded.
At Chandlers for drinks with friends including @hollysuekerns and my girl.
I've showered, shaved, trimmed nose hair, brushed teeth, donned my favorite red sport jacket, and am hitting the town for a few hours.
How come, if I am on the Do Not Call List, freaking telemarketers are waking me up most mornings? Jerks.
Utah looks pretty good. Not a big Utah fan but gotta root for the non-BCS team.
